title: Did Trump Inherit a ‘Depleted’ Stockpile of Ventilators From Obama?
subtitle: U.S. President Donald Trump repeatedly tried to buck the blame for the “empty cupboards” of federal emergency medical supplies.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: When U.S. President Donald Trump took office, he inherited a “bare” Strategic National Stockpile that lacked an adequate supply of mechanical ventilators that would have aided the nation at the start of the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic.
